sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3190 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , #ctrbSeqn# , #ctrbDdcd# , #ctrbTycd# , #ctrbYrmn# , #ctrbAmnt# , #bfyrDeam# , #detrAmnt# , #dyyrDeam# , #dyyrOtam# , #ayyrNtam# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO YETA3190 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , (AA.EDAC_RVYY + 1), AA.SETT_GBCD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, (SELECT (NVL(MAX(CTRB_SEQN),0) + 1) FROM YETA3190 AA01 WHERE AA01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AA01.EDAC_RVYY = (AA.EDAC_RVYY + 1) AND AA01.SETT_GBCD = AA.SETT_GBCD AND AA01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY) , AA.CTRB_DDCD, AA.CTRB_TYCD, AA.CTRB_AMNT, AA.CTRB_YRMN, AA.DYYR_DEAM, AA.AYYR_NTAM, 0, 0, 0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YETA3170 AA, ( SELECT BB01.*, BB02.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD FROM PSNL0100 BB01,PAYR0500 BB02 WHERE BB01.DPOB_CD = BB02.DPOB_CD AND BB01.SYSTEMKEY = BB02.SYSTEMKEY ) BB WHERE AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.AYYR_NTAM > 0 AND AA.EDAC_RVYY = (#edacRvyy# - 1) AND (( AA.CTRB_TYCD = '10' AND AA.CTRB_YRMN >= '2012') OR ( AA.CTRB_TYCD IN ('40','41') AND AA.CTRB_YRMN >= '2010') OR ( AA.CTRB_TYCD = '31' AND AA.CTRB_YRMN IN ('2011')) ) AND AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD = #typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM YETA3190 KK01 WHERE KK01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND KK01.EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND KK01.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND KK01.EDAC_RVYY = (AA.EDAC_RVYY + 1) AND KK01.SETT_GBCD = AA.SETT_GBCD AND KK01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY )
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3190 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn# , CTRB_DDCD=#ctrbDdcd# , CTRB_TYCD=#ctrbTycd# , CTRB_YRMN=#ctrbYrmn# , CTRB_AMNT=#ctrbAmnt# , BFYR_DEAM=#bfyrDeam# , DETR_AMNT=#detrAmnt# , DYYR_DEAM=#dyyrDeam# , DYYR_OTAM=#dyyrOtam# , AYYR_NTAM=#ayyrNtam# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3190 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

DELETE FROM YETA3190 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3190 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3190 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CTRB_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3190 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
